description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Run your way through 24 exciting levels! Jump on pedestrians to feed them to zombies, parkour together with ninjas, and catch pizzas thrown by robots while jumping from airplanes. This game has everything you could want.
description.short: Run your way through 24 exciting levels! Jump on pedestrians to feed them to zombies, parkour together with ninjas, and catch pizzas thrown by robots while jumping from airplanes. This game has everything you could want.
